maqras.text: Abakhongo ba Abafuru mubandu baye nibaboola mbu; “ Ewe Shuaib, khwitsa okhuwuyia ewe halala nende balia bakhusuubila mulukongo lwefu, nohomba mukalushe mumilukha chiefu.” Naboola; “Koo kata nichiakhusinya?”- (emilukha echo).”

Toto khulaba khuchishiile Nyasaye obubeyi nikhukalukha mumilukha chienyu, Nyasaye namalile okhuhonokosia nachio. Ne shikali khwifwe okhukalushila emilukha echo okhuyiniakhwo Nyasaye wefu Omulesi niyenya. Amachesi ka Nyasaye kaswana buli khushindu. Nyasaye niwakhwisikanga. Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, khwikulile, okhubusilie hakari wefu nende Abandu befu khubwatoto, nawe newe omulayi muno uwababusia
Abakhoongo babakhayi mubandu baye nibaboola; “Nimuloonda amakhuwa ka Shuaib toto awo mulaba abanyoola okhusikha”
Mana omurengo kweshialo kwoluyoka nikubabukula, mana nibubashielia mulukongo lwabu nibafumame nibali emilambo
Balia abayingasia Shuaib nibaba shinga abalaliwo tawe. Balia abayingasia Shuaib nibo banyoola okhusikha
Mana nabalekha naboola; “Enywe Abandu banje, ndabosilia oburume bwa Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, mana nebachelela, kho ndakhabelelela endie Abandu abakhayi.”
Ne shikhwaruma Omurumwa yesi yesi mulukongo halali khwatila abamenyamwo khu busandi nende khu butinyu khobanyoole okhwihotselesia
Mana khandi efwe khukalukhaninjia habundu wamabii okhuba andayi, mana nibatsililila, ne nibaboola; “Ubusandi nende omwikhoyo bianyoola bapapa befu” mana nikhubatila mapwoka nibashili okhumanya

Ne toto Abandu bomutsingongo babetsanga mbu basuubila mana baria Nyasaye, toto khwakhabeekulile tsikhabi okhurula mwikulu nende mwiloba. Halali bayingana mana nikhubatila khulwo khubeela kalia akabakhaabanga
Koo, Abandu betsingongo basuubilanga mbu eshinyasio shiefu sishilaboolela eshilo nabo nibali mukhukona tawe
Nohomba Abandu betsingongo basuubilanga mbu eshinyasio shiefu sishilaboolela eshitere nabo nibali mukhubaya tawe
Koo basuubila mbu banyala okhuliinda eshinyasio shia Nyasaye? Shibasuubilanga okhunyala eshinyasio shia Nyasaye tawe halali Abandu basikha
Koo shibamanyile balia ababukulanga eshialo Abandu bandi nibakharula mbu nikhwenya khulabara mumasila khutsimbi tsiabu, ne khupe eshimanyisio khumioyo chiabu, mana khulwendio balobe okhuwulila

Etso nitsingongo etsia khukhukanilanga amakhuwa katsio, Toto babeetsela Abarumwa babu, nende amebaalo kabulafu , kho shibali nibakhasuubila khukalia akabali nibakhaya khale, na endio ni lwa 7. Nyasaye akhupanga eshimanyisio khu mioyo chabakhayi
Ne abanji babu khwabanyoola mbu shini abesikwa khundakano tawe, halali abwatoto abanji mubo ni ababii
Mana nikhurulao nikhuruma Musa nende ebifune biefu, khu Firauni nende Abandu bebe, halali batsikholela obubii, kho henga shingala indukho ya abeyisasia yali
Ne Musa naboola; “Ewe Firauni, toto esie endi Omurumwa okhurula khu Omulesi webindu biosi.”
“Kanichilisia mbu ndalaboola khu- Nyasaye halali obwatoto, emalile okhubeetsela nende ebifune okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi kho lekhula Abana ba Israili babe ninasi
(Firaun) Nabola mbu; “Noli niwitsile nende eshilolelo nakhashirerekhwo toto noli mubandu ababoolanga obulaamba”
Nasukuna indabushi yiyie, mana nikalukhana inzukha yatoto
Ne narusia omukhono kukwe, nikukalukhana	omulafu	tswe khubakuhenganga
Abakhongo mubandu ba Firaun nibaboola mbu; “Toto uno ni Omulosi Omumanyi muno.”
Yenya okhubarusia mushialo shienyu, kho mulola murie
Nibaboola; “Muleshe hatiti ye nende Omusiani wabu, ne ruma abakhung’asinjia Abandu mumatokho.”
Bakhurerere buli Omulosi Omumunyi muno
Abalosi nibetsa khu Firaun, nibaboola mbu; “khwitsa okhunyoola omurungo nikali mbu khushila
Naboola mbu; “ Eeh! Efuchilila. Ne mwitsa okhuba abacheni banje”
Nibaboola mbu ; “Ewe Musa koo, newe witsa okhusukuna nohomba efwe khuranjilile?”
Musa naboola mbu ; “Enywe sukune” (ranjilile) Kho olwabasukuna belimia tsimoni tsiabandu mana nibabarisia nenibetsa nende obulosi obukhongo
